flawed_nl_solution:
There were 30*0.2=<<30*0.2=6>>6 people who didn't show up
So 30-6=<<30-6=24>>24 people showed up
Of the people who showed up, 24*0.75=<<24*0.75=18>>18 got steak
So 24-18=<<24-18=8>>8 got chicken
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 8. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
